TITLE: Importing AngularRedhawkModule in Angular Application
DESCRIPTION: Shows how to import and include the AngularRedhawkModule in an Angular application's main module definition.
SOURCE: https://github.com/geontech/angular-redhawk/blob/master/README.md#2025-04-22_snippet_1

LANGUAGE: typescript
CODE:
```
import { BrowserModule } from '@angular/platform-browser';
import { NgModule } from '@angular/core';
import { AppComponent } from './app.component';

import { AngularRedhawkModule } from 'angular-redhawk';

@NgModule({
  declarations: [
    AppComponent
  ],
  imports: [
    BrowserModule,
    AngularRedhawkModule
  ],
  providers: [],
  bootstrap: [AppComponent]
})
export class AppModule { }
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Installing Angular REDHAWK with npm
DESCRIPTION: Command to install the Angular REDHAWK library as a dependency in your Angular application using npm.
SOURCE: https://github.com/geontech/angular-redhawk/blob/master/README.md#2025-04-22_snippet_0

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
npm install --save angular-redhawk
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Configuring REST-Python Service via Pre-injection
DESCRIPTION: Demonstrates how to configure the REST-Python service connection before Angular's dependency injection by providing a custom configuration.
SOURCE: https://github.com/geontech/angular-redhawk/blob/master/README.md#2025-04-22_snippet_2

LANGUAGE: typescript
CODE:
```
import {
  AngularRedhawkModule,
  REST_PYTHON_CONFIG
}

@NgModule({
  imports: [
    AngularRedhawkModule
  ],
  providers: [
    { provide: REST_PYTHON_CONFIG, useValue: { host: 'aa.bb.cc.dd' } }
  ]
})
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Configuring REST-Python Service via Post-injection
DESCRIPTION: Shows how to configure the REST-Python service after dependency injection by injecting the service into a component and setting the configuration.
SOURCE: https://github.com/geontech/angular-redhawk/blob/master/README.md#2025-04-22_snippet_3

LANGUAGE: typescript
CODE:
```
import { RestPythonService } from 'angular-redhawk';

// In the Component
constructor(rp: RestPythonService) {
  rp.setConfiguration({ port: 9999 });
}
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Developing Angular REDHAWK Library Commands
DESCRIPTION: Bash commands for developers working on the Angular REDHAWK library, showing how to clone, install dependencies, build, and link the library for local development.
SOURCE: https://github.com/geontech/angular-redhawk/blob/master/README.md#2025-04-22_snippet_4

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
git clone <path to>/angular-redhawk
cd angular-redhawk
npm install
npm run build
cd dist
npm link
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Linking Angular REDHAWK to an Application
DESCRIPTION: Command to link the locally developed Angular REDHAWK library to an application for testing.
SOURCE: https://github.com/geontech/angular-redhawk/blob/master/README.md#2025-04-22_snippet_5

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
npm link angular-redhawk
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Adding Preserve Symlinks to Package.json
DESCRIPTION: Shows how to modify a project's package.json to add scripts that preserve symlinks when using Angular CLI, which is useful when working with linked libraries.
SOURCE: https://github.com/geontech/angular-redhawk/blob/master/README.md#2025-04-22_snippet_6

LANGUAGE: json
CODE:
```
"scripts": {
  "start":     "ng serve",
  "start:dev": "npm run start --preserve-symlinks"
}
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Running TSLint in Angular-REDHAWK Project
DESCRIPTION: This command runs TSLint to check for code style and potential errors in the project. Contributors are required to run this command and fix any issues before submitting merge requests.
SOURCE: https://github.com/geontech/angular-redhawk/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md#2025-04-22_snippet_0

LANGUAGE: Shell
CODE:
```
npm run lint
```
